description:
Any doubts I had about Lane's sexuality were cleared up as soon as I called him back to do more work. His response didn't surprise me when I told him he would be working with Addison, a Brit with a big uncut dick.

"Sounds interesting!" he said.

Straight guys don't usually think taking a long, thick cock up the ass is "interesting."

Yeah, Lane was just a little too excited, so even though he hasn't spilled the beans, it's pretty obvious.

Turns out Lane is an aggressive little bottom who likes to slip a finger up his top's asshole!
title: Lane & Addison
